players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Diana: "I am the Mafioso and I killed Bob last night. Keep investigating, there might be more to this case."
You: "Bob, I think Diana is the Mafioso. We should investigate Charlie next."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
